Name: Mount Your Friends
Overview: Mount Your Friends is a competitive sports/physics game that involves building a tower of speedo-clad gentlemen. One to four players take turns controlling randomly generated characters, climbing on top of each other QWOP-style to become the top of the tower. The game ends when a player is unable to reach the top of the tower before a timer runs out. The game was originally developed at the eighth Toronto Games Jam in 2013.
